data.title: Meeting Facilitators International
data.meta_description: We have provided meeting facilitators to a wide range of organizations. Our clients are primarily in the US and Canada and many of them refer us to others.
data.text:
Professional Meeting Facilitation

We have provided meeting facilitators to a wide range of organizations. Most are in the United States or Canada, but we have worked in thirteen different countries. We are proud of the number of repeat clients that we have and how often they refer us others.
